name: Overflo Game - Demo
description:
Overflo is starting to gain some stink! And by stink we mean good things. Overflo is a game about a sewer engineer who travels to the city of Overflo where he's confronted with citizens who have started to notice strange things, mainly a slimy green substance oozing from water sources. When the protagonist is confronted with an opportunity to help the town and repair the water lines, he begins his journey for the source of the toxic contamination and what he finds is something much more sinister than what he initially thought. Battle enemies, solve puzzles, and race the clock to save the town of Overflo!

This is a demo, I stopped development in 2019 after I ran out of time and resources.
